alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 22 at 8:15AM MDT until July 23 at 2:24AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Purgatoire River Near Las Animas affecting Bent County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River At Lamar affecting Prowers County. .Heavy rainfall over the past few days will cause the Purgatoire River at Las Animas to remain above flood stage. For the Purgatoire River...including Las Animas...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Purgatoire River Near Las Animas. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding occurs into low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM MDT Saturday was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 3.2 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.5 feet on 08/19/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 915 AM MDT.
